statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE location_id = 100 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_value > 50000 AND process_id IN (SELECT process_id FROM some_other_table WHERE condition = 'specific');
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE time_stamp < '2022-01-01' AND process_name LIKE '%Cooling%';
DELETE FROM process_location WHERE location_name = 'Plant A' AND country_code = 'US';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE process_name = 'Cooling System' AND energy_consumed > 500;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_summary WHERE total_consumption > 500 AND month_year = '2022-01-15';
